allow: Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "Generate a baseline specification for a beginner-friendly Physical AI Humanoid Robotics Book. Include: - Chapter list with titles and short description for each - Tools & software required (ROS2, Gazebo, Unity, Python, etc.) - Hardware components (sensors, motors, actuators) - Coding languages and libraries to use - Example projects or labs per chapter Format as Markdown for Speckit documentation." -Number 1 -ShortName "robotics-book-spec")

Bash(for part in part-01-foundations part-02-humanoid-design part-03-ai-perception part-04-motion-planning part-04-robot-control part-05-simulation part-06-kinematics part-07-motion-planning part-08-robot-hardware part-09-ethics part-10-applications part-11-research part-12-future-of-humanoids)
Bash(do dir_path="I:\AI Projects\Hackathon 1 AI humunoid book\physical-ai-book\docs\part-$i-*")
Bash(else echo "No directory found for part $i")

Bash(powershell "Get-ChildItem -Path ''I:\AI Projects\Hackathon 1 AI humunoid book\physical-ai-book\docs'' -Directory | Where-Object {$_Name -match ''^part-''} | Sort-Object {$_Name -replace ''^part-(\d+)'', {$args[0].PadLeft(3, ''0'')}}")

Bash(powershell "Get-ChildItem -Path ''I:\AI Projects\Hackathon 1 AI humunoid book\physical-ai-book\docs'' -Directory | Where-Object {$_Name -match ''^part-\d+''} | ForEach-Object {Write-Output $_Name}")
Bash(powershell "Get-ChildItem -Path ''I:\AI Projects\Hackathon 1 AI humunoid book\physical-ai-book\docs'' -Directory | Where-Object {$_Name -match ''^part-''} | Select-Object Name")

Bash(echo '<svg width=""200"" height=""50"" viewBox=""0 0 200 50"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id=""blueGradient"" x1=""0%"" y1=""0%"" x2=""100%"" y2=""100%"">
      <stop offset=""0%"" style=""stop-color:#0ea5e9;stop-opacity:1"" />
      <stop offset=""100%"" style=""stop-color:#0284c7;stop-opacity:1"" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- Background (transparent) -->
  <rect width=""200"" height=""50"" fill=""none""/>

  <!-- Humanoid robot icon with neural network -->
  <g transform=""translate(10, 10)"">
    <!-- Head with neural pattern -->
    <circle cx=""10"" cy=""5"" r=""6"" fill=""url(#blueGradient)""/>
    <circle cx=""8"" cy=""3"" r=""1"" fill=""#ffffff""/>
    <circle cx=""12"" cy=""3"" r=""1"" fill=""#ffffff""/>
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x=""7"" y=""11"" width=""6"" height=""10"" fill=""url(#blueGradient)""/>
    <!-- Arms -->
    <line x1=""3"" y1=""14"" x2=""17"" y2=""14"" stroke=""url(#blueGradient)"" stroke-width=""2""/>
    <!-- Legs -->
    <line x1=""10"" y1=""21"" x2=""10"" y2=""27"" stroke=""url(#blueGradient)"" stroke-width=""2""/>
    <line x1=""12"" y1=""21"" x2=""12"" y2=""27"" stroke=""url(#blueGradient)"" stroke-width=""2""/>

    <!-- Neural network dots -->
    <circle cx=""15"" cy=""0"" r=""1.5"" fill=""#0ea5e9""/>
    <circle cx=""18"" cy=""3"" r=""1.5"" fill=""#0284c7""/>
    <circle cx=""15"" cy=""6"" r=""1.5"" fill=""#0ea5e9""/>
  </g>

  <!-- Text -->
  <text x=""40"" y=""30"" font-family=""Arial, sans-serif"" font-size=""14"" fill=""#1e293b"" font-weight=""600"">
    Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
  </text>
</svg>')

Bash(echo '<svg width=""32"" height=""32"" viewBox=""0 0 32 32"" xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id=""blueGradient"" x1=""0%"" y1=""0%"" x2=""100%"" y2=""100%"">
      <stop offset=""0%"" style=""stop-color:#0ea5e9;stop-opacity:1"" />
      <stop offset=""100%"" style=""stop-color:#0284c7;stop-opacity:1"" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- Humanoid robot icon -->
  <g transform=""translate(10, 8)"">
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx=""6"" cy=""3"" r=""3"" fill=""url(#blueGradient)""/>
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x=""4"" y=""6"" width=""4"" height=""6"" fill=""url(#blueGradient)""/>
    <!-- Arms -->
    <line x1=""1"" y1=""8"" x2=""11"" y2=""8"" stroke=""url(#blueGradient)"" stroke-width=""1""/>
    <!-- Legs -->
    <line x1=""6"" y1=""12"" x2=""6"" y2=""15"" stroke=""url(#blueGradient)"" stroke-width=""1""/>
    <line x1=""8"" y1=""12"" x2=""8"" y2=""15"" stroke=""url(#blueGradient)"" stroke-width=""1""/>
  </g>
</svg>')
